Question 164) In the measurement of a new traffic light, the times are adjusted so that in each complete cycle (green-yellow), yellow light remains lit for 5 seconds, and the time when green light remains on is equal to 2 3 of the time when the red light is lit. Green light is lit in each cycle for x seconds and each cycle lasts and seconds.
What is the expression that represents the relationship between X and Y?
A) 5x - 3y + 15 = 0
B) 5x - 2y + 10 = 0
C) 3x - 3y + 15 = 0
D) 3x - 2y + 15 = 0
E) 3x - 2y + 10 = 0
